channel.title: Error while trying to walk
channel.description:
i have tried to use 2 clients and when i logged on i was doing some weird jumping emote. when i logged off i wasn't doing that emote, and i couldn't have because i haven't added the ::emote command.
anyway when i log on and try to walk i get this error on the cmd:
Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10243 at client.method101(client.java:7793) at client.method96(client.java:7552) at client.method114(client.java:8958) at client.method62(client.java:3054) at client.method7(client.java:2025) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:116) at client.run(client.java:4588) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
what should i do?

item.title: Error while trying to walk
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

Well, to my perspective i believe something in your, ArrayIndexOutOdBoundsException method is fucked lol.
anyways, thats just the client. try looking at your error, finding the methods that are there, and delete them.
for example, the

at client.method101(client.java:7793)

theres some fucking hapening in there
look up the line of code: 7793 and post it here, along with the other methods,
or, the easy way, get a new client.

Read full topic

item.title: Error while trying to walk
